segments.text: Take care , Peter . Don't run so fast.Are you tired ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . May I sit on the grass ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you mustn't sit on the grass.Don ' t you see the notes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can see it.But what's on it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It says Keep off the grass !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there's a bench under the tree.We can sit there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can't you see the notes there ? It says No smoking here .
segments.speaker: S1
